headline: Does EMCOR Group's (EME) Steady Dividend and Index Inclusion Reflect a Shift in Growth Strategy?
summary: On October 3, 2025, EMCOR Group, Inc. announced that its Board of Directors declared a regular quarterly cash dividend of US$0.25 per common share, payable on October 30, 2025 to stockholders of record as of October 15, 2025. This consistent dividend action, coupled with EMCOR's rising visibility following its recent inclusion in major equity indices, reflects the company's growing stature within the infrastructure and construction sector. We'll explore how EMCOR's dividend declaration and...

headline: Something Feels Off - And Billionaires Know It
summary: AI, gold, and disruption-proof stocks offer resilient investment opportunities amid market bubbles. Read how investors may approach any volatility in markets.
